data.meta_site_name: nurturing the blue and yellow flowers
data.text:
青華 Seika (Someya Yuujirou)English Translation

青華

Seika

Blue Flower

Sung by: Yuujirou (from LIP×LIP)

Lyrics: shito, Gom

Composer: shito

Album: Sukisugite Yabai ~Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai Character Song Collection~

—–

T/N: I’m sorry. I can’t wait until tomorrow. I have so many feelings over these solo songs. Especially over Yuujirou’s. My heart is full of them. Maybe you should ready some tissues? Just in case. Onwards you go ~

—–

産まれながらに分けられて

何が違うと比べてる

クシャクシャにした嘆きを

ゴミ箱に捨て眺めてた

Umare nagara ni wakerarete

Nani ga chigau to kurabeteru

Kushakusha ni shita nageki wo

Gomibako ni sute nagameteta

Already different when born and

Being compared to something not like me

I watched as my sorrow

Was crumpled and thrown in the trash

笑える場所はどこにある？

花咲く場所はどこにある？

光と水を奪った神様は今誰見てる

Waraeru basho wa doko ni aru?

Hanasaku basho wa doko ni aru?

Hikari to mizu wo ubatta kamisama wa ima dare miteru

Where is the place where I can laugh?

Where is the place where I can bloom?

Robbed of light and water, whom is god watching now?

ここにいる ここにいるよ

叫んだって届きはしない

愛せるか自分自身を

育てなきゃ種を

Koko ni iru koko ni iru yo

Saken datte todoki wa shinai

Aiseru ka jibun jishin wo

Sodate nakya tane wo

Right here, I’m right here

I scream but it doesn’t get through

Do I love myself

I have to nurture these seeds

定めなんかは枯らしてしまえ

そこに咲き誇れ 名もなき花たち

見ててください 見ててください

変わるために僕は君と出会う

雨は降れど色をつけた

Sadame nanka wa karashite shimae

Soko ni saki hokore na mo naki hanatachi

Mitete kudasai mitete kudasai

Kawaru tame ni boku wa kimi to deau

Ame wa furedo iro wo tsuketa

Let something like fate dry up away

The flowers over there in full bloom have no name

Please look at me, please look at me

So I could change, you and I met

The rain falls but our colors remain

諦めていた光は角度を変えて現れた

キラキラとした世界は

弱い僕らをあやしてた

Akirameteita hikari wa kakudo wo kaete arawareta

Kirakira to shita sekai wa

Yowai bokura wo ayashiteta

The light that gave up appeared at a different standpoint

A glistening world

Comfort the us who are weak

必要とする人がいる

認められたい人がいる

口にせずとも感じた

嫌いなものが一緒だった

Hitsuyō to suru hito ga iru

Mitomeraretai hito ga iru

Kuchi ni sezutomo kanjita

Kirai na mono ga issho datta

There are people who need it

Some who want to be acknowledged

I am aware without (you) saying anything

The things we hate were the same

探してる 探してるよ

叫んだって届きはしない

君のため 僕らのため

育てなきゃ花を

Sagashiteru sagashiteru yo

Saken datte todoki wa shinai

Kimi no tame bokura no tame

Sodate nakya hana wo

Searching, I am searching

I scream but it doesn’t get through

For your sake, for our sake

I have to nurture these flowers

美しく咲け 強く根を張れ

踏まれても僕らは下を向かない

見ててください 見ててください

どんな花とも違う綺麗な色

青の側に色を添える

Utsukushiku sake tsuyoku ne wo hare

Fumarete mo bokura wa shita wo mukanai

Mitete kudasai mitete kudasai

Donna hanatomo chigau kirei na iro

Ao no soba ni iro wo soeru

Blooming beautifully, strongly rooted

Even if stepped on, we won’t bow our heads

Please look at us, please look at us

Flowers are different but all their colors are pretty

Next to blue, it adds color

当たり前と思ってた

一人で名前を書く答案用紙

1と1を足してみたら100を超えて1000になって

知った

Atarimae to omotteta

Hitori de namae wo kaku tōan yōshi

1 to 1 wo tashite mitara 100 wo koete 1000 ni natte

Shitta

I thought it was natural

A blank paper to write your name alone

Adding 1 and 1 and finding it exceeded 100 and became 1000

I understood

弱い所も足りない所も

全て埋め合って育てていくんだ

僕たちの花 世界に咲けと

今も心を込めて歌っている

Yowai tokoro mo tarinai tokoro mo

Subete ume atte sodatete ikunda

Bokutachi no hana sekai ni sake to

Ima mo kokoro wo komete utatteiru

Your weak parts and the parts you are lacking

I’ll make up for it all and nurture them

With our flowers, blooming in the world

Right now I still sing with all my heart

定めなんかは枯らしてしまえ

そこに咲き誇れ 名もなき花たち

見ててください 見ててください

変わるために僕は君と出会う

Sadame nanka wa karashite shimae

Soko ni saki hokore na mo naki hanatachi

Mitete kudasai mitete kudasai

Kawaru tame ni boku wa kimi to deau

Let something like fate dry up away

The flowers over there in full bloom have no name

Please look at us, please look at us

So I could change, you and I met
